name: Chaos Sorcerer Lord

abilities.name: Oracular Visions
abilities.description: Put a hero dice here until the end of round. Players can re-roll any save rolls of 1 while in the same chamber as the Chaos Sorcerer Lord.

abilities.name: The Power of Chaos
abilities.description: If you roll a 6 for the Chaos Sorcerer Lord's attack roll, its damage is doubled.

renown: If you slay an enemy using the Power of Chaos, earn 2 renown.
